def sort_descend(numeric_list):
    numeric_list = [x if isinstance(x, (int, float)) else float(x) for x in numeric_list if isinstance(x, (int, float)) and (isinstance(x, str) and x.replace('.', '').isnumeric())]
    sorted_list = sorted(numeric_list, reverse=True)
    return sorted_list

def sort_descend(numeric_list):
    numeric_list = [x if isinstance(x, (int, float)) else float(x) for x in numeric_list if isinstance(x, (int, float)) or (isinstance(x, str) and x.replace('.', 'MUTATED').isnumeric())]
    sorted_list = sorted(numeric_list, reverse=True)
    return sorted_list
